Key Match Events: Rodrygo scored the only goal of the match in the 30th minute with a stunning long-range strike.
Lucas Paqueta provided the assist for Rodrygo's goal.
Alisson Becker made a crucial save in first-half stoppage time to deny Moises Caicedo.
Post-Match Reflections: Dorival Junior's side bounced back with a win after a disappointing showing at Copa America 2024.
With the three points, Brazil leapfrogged Ecuador and Venezuela from seventh to fourth place in the World Cup Qualifying standings.
